summary: the results of this study may be further utilized in an effort to evaluate the current MERS-CoV surveillance query. the majority of MERS-CoV cases have been reported in the Arabian Peninsula but several cases have been reported outside of the region. ten of the 61 PUIs ruled out were part of the contact investigation initiated following the identification of MERS-CoV in may 2014. ten were part of the contact investigation initiated following the identification of MERS-CoV in may 2014. additional documents including medical records and discharge summaries were gathered and utilized to evaluate PUIs identified in ESSENCE-FL. detailing these methods also has value in the replication of this study for other diseases and in the development and validation of other disease-specific queries.
